description: The Bing Ads SDK is a library improving developer experience when working with the Bing Ads services by providing high-level access to features such as Bulk API, OAuth Authorization and SOAP API.
releaseNotes:
1. Service proxies are added to the [Reporting]( https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bing-ads-overview-release-notes.aspx#reporting_v9_sharedbudget_august2016) APIs with additional columns for shared budgets. 
2. Service proxies are added to the [Campaign Management]( https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bing-ads-overview-release-notes.aspx#campaign_v10_scheduling_august2016) and [Bulk]( https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bing-ads-overview-release-notes.aspx#bulk_v10_scheduling_august2016) APIs for managing ad extension scheduling. In addition to service proxy updates, support is added to the ad extension BulkEntity objects (e.g. BulkAppAdExtension) for reading and writing the Ad Schedule, Start Date, End Date, and Use Searcher Time Zone columns in each ad extension Bulk file record.
3. The BulkSitelink2AdExtension, BulkAdGroupSitelink2AdExtension, and BulkCampaignSitelink2AdExtension objects are added to the SDK for reading and writing the corresponding [Sitelink2 Ad Extension](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bing-ads-bulk-sitelink2-ad-extension-record.aspx), [Ad Group Sitelink2 Ad Extension](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bing-ads-bulk-ad-group-sitelink2-ad-extension-record.aspx), and [Campaign Sitelink2 Ad Extension](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bing-ads-bulk-campaign-sitelink2-ad-extension-record.aspx) Bulk file records.
4. The BulkBudget object is added to the SDK for reading and writing the corresponding [Budget](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bing-ads-bulk-budget-record.aspx) Bulk file record. Also the BulkCampaign object is updated with support for reading and writing the Budget Id column in the [Campaign](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bing-ads-bulk-campaign-record.aspx) Bulk file record.
title: Bing Ads SDK
